description:
I was in the garage painting with Charlotte when it really hit me. 
I do not like to post about (or talk about for that matter) politics bc to me, the majority of it is all just lies & bullshit. BUT as I look at my sweet, carefree daughter, I remember that it was those before me who were BRAVE enough to speak out, that aided in the ability for her to live this life. 
I have always tried to keep my account real & raw & honest as I navigate my way through motherhood, but I have failed you. Up until now, I have been a complete coward. Throughout this past month-and-a-half, I’ve allowed others to fight in the trenches, while I sat hiding in the shadows. All because I was too scared of being burnt at the stake by my social media “friends.” Well, friends, I’ve had enough. I’m sick of hiding, I’m sick of disappointing myself, & I’m sick of teaching my daughter to be bold & brave while not being bold & brave myself. 
There is a A LOT of messed up stuff going on right under our noses right now, but what I’m talking about here, are the plans @thisisbillgates has in store for us...it’s real & it’s important & #IdoNotConsent. I #SayNoToBillGates bc I will not let some not-a-doctor billionaire be in charge of my (or my daughter’s) health/body/life. #NoNewNormal
*If you’re unaware of what’s been going on with Bill, & you’re interested, DM me for ALLLLLL the deets. ✌🏻
Happy earrings by @holaguava 💋 🌈
